mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.com_id, password, name, authority, (SELECT max(subs_expiration) FROM erpSubs WHERE com_id = #{comId}) subs_expiration, option_code FROM erpUser u LEFT JOIN erpSUbs s1 ON (u.com_id= s1.com_id) WHERE u.com_id = #{comId}

SELECT e.emp_id, e.com_id, pwd, emp_name, subs_expiration, option_code, master, e.dept_code, CASE WHEN master IS NOT NULL THEN 'master' ELSE auth_code END auth_code FROM employees e JOIN erpSubs s1 ON (e.com_id = s1.com_id) LEFT JOIN departments a ON (e.dept_code = a.dept_code)
WHERE e.emp_id=#{username} AND e.com_id=#{comId} AND s1.subs_expiration = (SELECT MAX(subs_expiration) FROM erpSubs WHERE com_id = e.com_id)
